title: >>> The Suitable REPLACEMENT
body_text:
... Hogan vs. Andre ... Ali vs. Frasier ... a never-ending list ...
TWO MEN. ONE MATCH.
That's all it takes for the 70th clash to go down as one of the true greats known to the sport of dodgeball.
For weeks, a colossal "dream match" was in the works as two of the biggests arms would meet for the very first time;
Chris Adams vs. Kevin Megill
. But there's been a curve in the road to DODGEBALL 70, and a new encounter has taken shape.
The Suitable Replacement
It has come to the attention of several dodgeball elitest that one Kevin Megill has backed out of his match with the legendary Chris Adams this coming Saturday night. This has certainly left a void, one that will be extremely hard to fill. Who could possibly replace one of the biggest icons to ever compete?
Just when you think DODGEBALL 70 is down and out, a volunteer steps up to the challenge. At the forthcoming 70th event, the world
will
witness
Chris vs. Kevin
...
Chris Adams
vs.
Kevin Fitzpatrick
"Legend vs. Legend"
First time ever!
body_html:
... Hogan vs. Andre ... Ali vs. Frasier ... a never-ending list ...

TWO MEN. ONE MATCH.
That's all it takes for the 70th clash to go down as one of the true greats known to the sport of dodgeball.

For weeks, a colossal "dream match" was in the works as two of the biggests arms would meet for the very first time; Chris Adams vs. Kevin Megill. But there's been a curve in the road to DODGEBALL 70, and a new encounter has taken shape.

The Suitable Replacement
It has come to the attention of several dodgeball elitest that one Kevin Megill has backed out of his match with the legendary Chris Adams this coming Saturday night. This has certainly left a void, one that will be extremely hard to fill. Who could possibly replace one of the biggest icons to ever compete?

Just when you think DODGEBALL 70 is down and out, a volunteer steps up to the challenge. At the forthcoming 70th event, the world will witness Chris vs. Kevin ...

Chris Adams
vs.
Kevin Fitzpatrick

"Legend vs. Legend"
First time ever!
